metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7655 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Eclipse Mosquitto version from 1.0 to 1.4.15, a Null Dereference vulnerability was found in the Mosquitto library which could lead to crashes for those applications using the library. It was discovered that Mosquitto incorrectly handled certain inputs. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-7655` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmosquitto1 - 1.5.5-1.1
libmosquittopp1 - 1.5.5-1.1
mosquitto - 1.5.5-1.1
mosquitto-clients - 1.5.5-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.5-1.1').
